mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PRODUCT_INFO WHERE CATE_ID=#{cate_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT_INFO ( CATE_ID, PRD_NAME, PRD_ID, PRD_PRICE, PRD_IMG, PRD_DELIVERY, PRD_STOCK, PRD_OPTION, PRD_DISCOUNT, PRD_EXPLAIN ) VALUES ( #{cate_id}, #{prd_name}, #{prd_id}, #{prd_price}, #{prd_img}, #{prd_delivery}, #{prd_stock}, #{prd_option}, #{prd_discount}, #{prd_explain} )
mapper.update: UPDATE PRODUCT_INFO SET CATE_ID = #{cate_id}, PRD_NAME = #{prd_name}, PRD_PRICE = #{prd_price}, PRD_DELIVERY = #{prd_delivery}, PRD_STOCK = #{prd_stock}, PRD_OPTION = #{prd_option}, PRD_DISCOUNT = #{prd_discount}, PRD_EXPLAIN = #{prd_explain} WHERE PRD_ID = #{prd_id}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PRODUCT_INFO WHERE UPPER(PRD_NAME) LIKE UPPER('%'||#{sPrd}||'%') OR LOWER(PRD_NAME) LIKE LOWER('%'||#{sPrd}||'%')
